div.p: This parameter defines values for place sub-classifications

definitions.add:
npgsql
SELECT ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID AS ID, ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL.VAL AS VAL FROM ENT_VRSN_TBL INNER JOIN PLC_TBL USING (ENT_VRSN_ID) INNER JOIN ENT_NAME_TBL ON (ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID = ENT_NAME_TBL.ENT_ID AND ENT_NAME_TBL.USE_CD_ID = '1EC9583A-B019-4BAA-B856-B99CAF368656' AND ENT_NAME_TBL.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) INNER JOIN ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL USING (NAME_ID) WHERE HEAD -- HAS A PARENT AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ENT_REL_TBL WHERE TRG_ENT_ID = ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID AND REL_TYP_CD_ID = 'BFCBB345-86DB-43BA-B47E-E7411276AC7C')
